name: Gaurav Fashion
overview:
Gaurav Fashion began its modest business operation in 1985 as a sole proprietor in city Jaipur of Rajasthan India. Over a period of three decades it has successfully established itself a premier brand name in Manufacturing and Supplying of Men’s T-Shirt, Track Suit, Sweat Shirt, Sports Wear, Uniform Accessories and many more.

Our Team: Designers Spinners Weavers Quality controllers Administrative staff

Our Infrastructure: We have an amazing infrastructure backed with complete state-of –the –art facilities. We have ensured our production unit has latest machinery and equipments necessary for quality production and also meet the bulk demands of the clients. We are prompt with up gradation of machine and technology as and when required.

Our Quality: We are a quality centric company with a complete focus on manufacturing world class products. We manufacture products with a commitment to give excellent quality products to the customers. To attain this quality our whole unit works with complete dedication, our quality team also makes a lot of effort. Smooth process of manufacturing is followed to achieve the motive.

Why Us?”; We have earned a substantial share of market with our products, due to our quality. We have been successful in earning a great name and comprehensive growth due to our excellent range of products which get manufactured at our unit which is supported with awesome infrastructure, modern machinery and experienced staff.
